text:
Roseanne is back on Tuesday, May 1st on ABC at 8:00 p.m. with a new episode titled “No Country For Old Women.” Here’s the synopsis:

After Beverly gets kicked out of the nursing home, Roseanne and Jackie fight over who will take care of their mother. Meanwhile, Mark’s creative touch with building a birdhouse for Dan’s customer is more than Dan can handle, but Darlene defends her son.

Roseanne originally aired on ABC from 1988 to 1997, hit No. 1 in the Nielsen ratings in 1990, and stayed in the top four across six of its nine seasons. It earned praise for its depiction of blue collar America, its hardworking parents, and its commitment to tackling social issues.

The series captured Emmy wins for Barr and Metcalf. John Goodman was nominated seven times, but did not win for Outstanding Lead Actor.
title: Roseanne Episode 6 Trailer and Details

meta_data.description: The Roseanne revival is finally here. We have an episode guide and trailers...
